indicator_name: 15세 이상의 여성과 여아 중에서 지난 12개월 동안 친밀한 파트너 이외에 다른 사람들로부터 성적 폭력을 당한 경험이 있는 인구 비율(연령 및 사건발생 장소별)
target_name: 인신매매, 성적 착취 및 기타 형태의 착취를 포함하여 공적 및 사적 영역에서 모든 여성과 여아에 대한 모든 형태의 폭력 근절
un_custodian_agency: UNICEF, UN Women, UNFPA, WHO, UNODC

en.target_name: Eliminate all forms of violence against all women and girls in the public and private spheres, including trafficking and sexual and other types of exploitation
en.computation_definitions:
National data (Type1)
This is the national produced statistics in the ROK that best corresponds to the definition of UN SDGs indicators.
Download the national metadata file for more information.
en.indicator_name: Proportion of women and girls aged 15 years and older subjected to sexual violence by persons other than an intimate partner in the previous 12 months, by age and place of occurrence
en.global_indicator_name: Proportion of women and girls aged 15 years and older subjected to sexual violence by persons other than an intimate partner in the previous 12 months, by age and place of occurrence
en.data_name: Proportion of people who have experienced sexual violence in the previous 12 months
en.indicator_definition: The proportion of people who have experienced sexual violence in the previous 12 months. Types of sexual violence include sexual assault, attempted rape, rape, obscene phone calls, illegal filming, dissemination of obscene material, indecent exposure, and sexual harrassment.
en.computation_calculations: Interviews with 10,000 males and females aged 19-64
en.graph_title: Proportion of people who have experienced sexual violence in the previous 12 months
en.source_organisation_1: Women’s and Youth Rights Support Division, Women’s and Youth Rights Promotion Bureau, Ministry of Gender Equality and Family
